review: I have 2 of these, one was powered by the included adapter, the other off of the TV's USB port.  the one powered off of the adapter works great, the one on the TV's USB port was spotty at best.  I ran it this way for a few months before pulling my head out of my rear and running them both off of the included ac adapter.  After the switch, there is still the occasional drop of communication between the chromecast and controlling device, but it is no where near as frequent or problematic as when I was running it off of the USB port. if yours is giving you communication problems, or dropping the wifi connection and needing to be reset a lot, try using the power adapter if you aren't already, it might help, it did for me.
